Responses to open text questions


Web Site: McMaster University
Date of Analysis: August 08, 2020
Number of Responses Analysed: 18

Return to Summary Page



What do you think is the best aspect of this web site, and why?
Respondent ID Comment
1 All faculty list and all faculty member list. Because of that, I can easily find my expected faculty and faculty members.
2 The filter of professors is helpful when searching for different areas
3 uses images/pics to illustrate/show something.
4 It seems to streamline the application process for a new student
5 The research area of professors are listed right under the profile photos. It is clearer than the Standford website which you have to open the link to see the specific content.
6 organization
7 UI is good.
8 It is pretty easy to find admission information if you are a prospective student.
9 colour combination aesthetics
10 It is easy to tell where you are, and links are easily accessible.
11 The tabs are all properly labeled and have drop down items. Each section has different tabs items that are related to that section .
12 The best aspect would be the search option had some suggestion.
13
14 simple and everything is on order
15 .none.
16 User Interface
17 big fonts good for eyes
18 Presentation because help to navigate easily

How to read the table

The table on this page displays actual unedited comments each respondent made to the open question. If blank, no comment was made. The best way of looking at them is to read the comments and notice themes which occur regularly.


Content Analysis service at WAMMI.COM

WAMMI provides a popular additional service where respondents comments are sorted into a mangeable number of categories and presented according to percentage distribution and global usability scores. Examples of comments for each category are given in a written report. Please contact us for information about our Content Analysis Service.
